title: Decision in Â£190mln reference postponed till Jan 13
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 06 (APP):The decision in the 190 million pound reference against the PTI founder and Bushra Bibi has been postponed once again due to the leave of Accountability Court Judge Nasir Javed Rana.
The court was to pronounce the verdict, but due to the leave of Judge Nasir Javed Rana, the hearing was adjourned until January 13.
The accountability court reserved the verdict on December 18, after the parties completed their arguments and had given December 23 as the date for the verdict, but due to the non-availability of the judge, the date for the verdict was set for January 6.
However, today too, due to the unavailability of the judge, a new date of January 13, was set for the verdict, regarding which the court staff informed the lawyer of the founder of PTI and Bushra Bibi.
